testcase.name: Search results are displayed for a valid product search - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on flipKart home page.....................................passed When I hover over the Fashion category in the navigation bar................passed And I navigate to Men_Footwear and then Men’s Sports Shoes..................passed Then I will be navigated to product's detail page...........................passed Then I hover over the Discount filter on the left-hand side of the page.....passed When I select a discount filter "30% or more"...............................passed
